startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: Smart Buddies is solving the problem of keeping children engaged and learning, especially during the pandemic. They offer an award-winning coding robot that helps children start coding within minutes, by offering unlimited live remote coding classes with actual teachers and kids across the country. They are also offering discounted programs to help parents and teachers during the pandemic. Their products do not require coding experience and have been recommended for children aged 7-11. Smart Buddies' goal is to help parents introduce their children to STEM concepts and have fun while learning.
venture_capital_fund_investment_industri: ESG finance, Impact investing, Healthcare, Industrials, Sustainable finance, Financial inclusion, Environment, Aging, Education, Food systems, Finance.
venture_capital_fund_investment_stages: Seed, Series A Stage, Series B Stage

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: Latii aims to solve the problem of slow lead times and high costs in the construction industry's procurement process. Their cloud-based supply chain platform connects customers with verified and reliable manufacturers in both Latin America and America, offering a range of precision parts, including fasteners, windows and doors, structural steel, and metal casting. Latii promises cost savings of up to 20% and faster lead times of up to 70%, while also reducing the carbon footprint and improving safety standards. They offer a customized solution to each project, tailored to meet the specific needs of the customer, and provide efficient management of the procurement process while ensuring high-quality products. To receive updates on when their services are ready, customers can send an email to info@latii.com.

Steadily landlord insurance is solving the problem of providing affordable, fast and knowledgeable landlord insurance policies to people who rent their homes to others. Their highly rated insurance policy on TrustPilot covers a wide range of risks such as legal liabilities, fire and water damage, natural disasters, and others. They provide coverage not only for apartments, single-family, condo units, multi-family, manufactured, and vacant or restoration properties, but also for AirBNBs, VRBOs, and other rentals. They have a quick and easy process for getting a policy set up and offer no hidden cancellation fees. They also provide a responsive and supportive customer service with a team of knowledgeable agents across the nation.

Kojo is a platform that provides a one-stop-shop for contractors to manage all their material and inventory needs. It streamlines purchasing, reduces time spent processing orders, and organizes material cost data across all teams and systems. Kojo also integrates with accounting and project management software. Its objective is to help contractors work smarter, not harder, by providing better materials management and reducing costs and waste. Kojo serves a wide range of trades such as mechanical, concrete, roofing, electrical, flooring, and drywall.

OpenSpace provides next-generation construction reality capture software, powerful integrations, and the smartest analytics tools in the industry. Its solutions aim to solve the problem of inefficiency in the construction industry by providing real-time project monitoring, reducing the need for manual inspections and allowing for remote collaboration between project stakeholders. OpenSpace Capture and OpenSpace Track are two of its products that enable jobsite capture and technology integration respectively. Its clientele includes owners, general contractors, and workers in the construction trades. The company strives to provide resources such as an academy, support, an event calendar, a blog, and a community-centered FAQ section. Its goal is to create a safer and more efficient jobsite experience for everyone.

This startup provides end-to-end smart home solutions that integrate with a wide range of smart home hardware, as well as with most property management and CRM tools. Their products and solutions include access control, smart locks, smart sensors, smart thermostats, self-guided tours, community WiFi, parking management, asset protection, smart apartments, and more. They offer seamless connectivity platform that integrates a customer's choice of hardware with their cloud-based enterprise software for smarter properties. Their goal is to simplify operations with smart home solutions for multifamily properties, resulting in increased NOI, efficiency, and positive experiences for property managers and residents. They also offer hardware customization that fits any building, property, or housing style.

Pronto is a startup that offers affordable housing compliance software, which helps reduce costs for property owners and renters of affordable housing. Their software allows for the management of leasing and annual compliance for any affordable housing program, as well as the configuration of any form of questionnaire. Pronto's compliance team provides tech-enabled services ensuring transparency and efficiency, which help to manage 5x as many units and lease 5x faster. The platform offers full transparency so the customers can instantly see the status of compliance and gain ESG insights across their portfolio. The software also offers a simplified process for renters, with features similar to SMS messaging system.

Built aims to solve the problem of slow and manual processes in construction loan administration, which can hinder the movement of money into projects. They offer a collaborative platform that eliminates siloed systems and automates tasks to accelerate the payment process, reduce risk, and improve business performance. Built's platform also provides features such as payment and lien waiver management, inspections technology, and project tracking to ensure greater transparency and control for the parties involved in the construction and real estate ecosystem. Through their solutions, Built hopes to streamline and simplify the loan administration process, allowing for smarter and faster money movement for all stages of the property lifecycle.

Assured Insurance Technologies provides a Claims Intelligence Platform that enables insurance companies to process structured claims data in an efficient and intelligent manner. The company offers various solutions such as a FNOL web app for gathering structured data, automation of catastrophe response, and fraud investigative support. Furthermore, they provide no-code plugins for augmenting existing claims processes. The platform also consolidates enterprise-wide communication through omnichannel, omnidirectional messaging powered by humans and AI. Assured aims to offer modern claims revolution by assisting insurance companies to make intelligent decisions and reduce damages through proactive notifications.

Startup Bridgit Bench is providing workforce planning software for construction companies. It offers a centralized workforce planning home base that can standardize labor requests and approvals, provide a full suite of communication tools, and offer a 360° view of the entire workforce. Bridgit Bench helps to build strong teams based on skills and experience, and the startup offers smart suggestions for fast and easy allocations, which can cut travel times and keep team satisfaction high. The platform is designed to help contractors plan the best possible teams for their project needs by integrating project data and ensuring the best allocation of their resources in order to make their workforce strategy more efficient.

AgentSync is a startup that aims to connect insurance carriers, agencies, and MGAs to modern insurance infrastructure that helps to power up their growth, increase efficiency, and reduce risk. The startup provides a cloud-native solution that brings modern automation techniques and user-friendly experiences tailored for both producers and agents. The platform also ensures continuous compliance of agents and agencies by incorporating hundreds of regulatory changes directly into the product. AgentSync provides tools that are cost-efficient and cost-transparent to enhance producers reachability and keep their activity optimized. In summary, AgentSync intends to future-proof an insurance business, and its customers recognize the company's expertise in producer management.

This startup invests in early-stage PropTech companies and provides capital and guidance to help them scale. Their goal is to support technologies that impact how people, processes, and ecosystems interact with buildings and other built environments. They connect their portfolio companies with customers, partners, and industry professionals to help them grow. Additionally, they own a laboratory of national properties that provide startups with a testing ground for developing their products, concepts and services. Finally, they offer insights and updates on their website about latest investments and industry trends.

Finley is a software designed to assist finance teams in automating the credit facility management process and streamlining funding operations. The platform streamlines operations, reduces human error and centralizes knowledge to minimize capital risk and optimize funding availability. Finley is intended for both debt capital borrowers and providers and allows them to manage their funding operations in minutes rather than hours. The software helps high-growth companies make the most of their credit facilities, and is recommended by Dalton Caldwell, Managing Director at Y Combinator.

Bungalow is a platform that offers shared living spaces with flexible lease lengths and moving dates. They make it easy to find roommates with their meet and greet chat and provide a seamless rental experience with a mobile app that lets residents take care of everything from managing maintenance requests to making monthly payments. Their responsive team is available 24/7 to help with unexpected issues. By vetting everyone in their community and managing common area furniture and utilities, they make moving and living with roommates simpler and less risky. Bungalow also provide actual humans to assist in case of resident-caused damages and offer up to 30% in savings on rent compared to other rentals.

Inspectify is a startup that provides a better way of doing home, property, and rental inspections using their inspection services, inspection reporting, and home rehab. They offer scheduled fast inspections and nationwide coverage for everyone who needs data captured on the property. Their services can benefit everyone, whether you are a single-family or institutional investor, real estate wholesaler, agent, buyer, seller, or homeowner. Inspectify is also beneficial for inspectors who want to grow their business by becoming an inspector on the platform. The company claims to have helped many users in growing their business, keeping their team busy, and making missed calls and lengthy message threads a thing of the past.

handdii is a startup that aims to solve the problem of the traditional and complicated process of filing property insurance claims and connecting customers with contractors. Through its smart tech, handdii connects insurance companies directly with contractors, enabling customers to easily register their claims and get the right local contractor to repair their property quickly. This makes the repair process easy, fast, and convenient for all parties involved. handdii also offers transparency and proactive communication to keep everyone informed. By doing so, handdii puts the control back into the hands of the customer and helps contractors excel at the work they do while saving insurers significant claims costs. Ultimately, handdii simplifies the property repair process for everyone and offers a unique solution to a specific problem area in insurance claim fulfillment.

Guzo is a collaboration platform that offers organizations and ecosystems with different plans to connect, network, and collaborate with others. It aims to facilitate communication, simplify collaboration, and enhance teamwork by providing messaging and collaboration tools, direct SMS and email capabilities, contact management, document storage, proposal fulfillment, and other features. The platform ensures transparency and visibility into the collaboration efforts and project status, providing a unified, on-platform experience. It allows customers to manage their collaborations, form creation, and messaging history among others. Guzo's goal is to offer a simplified and effective way to connect with partners, suppliers, and customers, and successfully accomplish their business needs.

Startup aims to solve the problem of finding workspace and community for freelancers and entrepreneurs who want a flexible and cost-effective solution. They provide pop-up coworking events and curated professional experiences in people's homes. Users can join or sign in to access and book these spaces and events. Their goal is to create a supportive community and make it easy for people to find inspiring spaces to work and connect with like-minded individuals. However, there is not enough information provided to determine whether they solve any additional user problems.

Daycation is solving the problem of people not being able to visit luxurious hotels and resorts because of the high cost of accommodations or memberships. It provides users with day passes to different hotels and resorts, allowing them to enjoy the amenities such as the pool, beach, chairs, and umbrellas, along with credits or discounts at the property's restaurant and bars and a discount on valet parking. Users can choose from a wide variety of hotels and resorts across the United States, Mexico, the British Virgin Islands, Colombia, and Costa Rica, and the packages usually start around $40 per person. The app allows people to book these day passes easily and conveniently on their mobile devices or websites. The service targets locals who are looking for a mini-vacation or a break from their usual routine, without having to go through the hassle of booking a hotel room and paying for a full stay.

Petal issues credit cards for every type of credit builder, aimed at helping users build their credit without an annual membership fee. Petal 1 offers 2%-10% cashback at select merchants, has a $300-$5,000 credit limit, and a variable APR of 24.74%-34.24%. Petal 2 has no fees of any kind and offers 1%-1.5% cashback on everyday purchases and more offers, has a $300-$10,000 credit limit, and a variable APR of 17.74% - 31.74%. The startup provides an easy method of checking if users are pre-approved without any credit check. The app is useful in Stay up to date on your credit score and enable push notifications to see your transaction activity in real-time. Petal's cards work as credit builders and aim to help users grow their credit score with responsible credit use.

Endpoint Payment Solutions is offering modern, innovative, and global payment solutions through their card issuing platform, frontend APIs and SDKs, and advanced features with enhanced security. Their technology services include solutions development, program management, and program P&L optimization. The startup prides itself on modern payment card solutions, expert knowledge, and features that can be fully customized to fit the user's needs. Through their APIs, SDKs, and fully customizable apps, they aim to enable the next generation of payment card solutions while ensuring global solutions.

Travelsist aims to solve the problem of providing on-demand personal assistance to passengers-in-need, particularly to those who have disabilities, families with small children, travelers with language barriers, travelers with autism, travelers struggling with wayfinding and elderly travelers. Its innovative technology and a workforce of Travelsistants aim to ensure a safe, smooth, and seamless airport experience accessible to anyone and everyone. It also aims to offer job opportunities to job seekers in and around opportunity zones as Travelsistants and ambassadors for their cities. Thus, it is redefining the passenger services and airport customer experience, as well as contributing to the economic growth of East Lake, Clarkston, and Southside Atlanta.

Vyrill aims to help brands, retailers, and agencies turn browsers into buyers by enabling them to source video content that is relevant to their brand and understand what is being talked about. They provide a free app for Shopify merchants that includes data on demographics, sentiment, word cloud insights, keyword reports, and brand safety. Vyrill uses its own proprietary AI technology to find, source, and analyze brand-safe videos that resonate with the audience. The AI technology analyzes various components of the video, including text, speech, and footage, and captures, watches, listens, organizes, rates, ranks, and analyzes videos and creator profiles in a fraction of the time. Vyrill unlocks insights from the videos using its unique, proprietary AI-driven technology, matching millions of videos on youtube to entire product catalogs by brand, product, category, and competitor.   Vyrill solves the problem of helping brands understand what consumers are talking about and their preferences by using AI technology to analyze video content. The platform aims to bridge the gap between marketing and the content presented to shoppers. Brands and retailers can save significant time by using Vyrill's Artificial Intelligence technology to source and analyze significant video content at scale. Video content sourced via Vyrill platform is a powerful tool that can be used in making data-driven decisions. The platform's proprietary technology removes vanity metrics and other metrics that may not provide accurate insights to brands and helps brands understand how shoppers interact with their products in real-life scenarios. By analyzing components of the video, such as text, speech, and footage, Vyrill enables brands and retailers to understand consumer media and preferences.

Pivt aims to solve the problem of social isolation, misplaced expectations, unanswered questions, and uncertainty that people often experience after relocating or moving to a new place. They recognize that social wellbeing is crucial for the relocation process and that the pandemic has further worsened this issue, with 40% of corporate relocations failing due to social isolation. Pivt wants to help people by building and cultivating a community around them, thus making them feel like they belong and are not alone. Their digital tools and assessments will assist people in defining why they want to move, and then they provide occasional check-ins, meaningful content, and actionable insights to support and retain employees, improve mobility programs and ensure a healthy mindset for the relocated workforce.

Stax aims to solve the problem of limited access to financial services, particularly in Africa, by providing a simple and secure platform for transferring money, purchasing airtime, and paying bills. The app is available for android users in nine African countries, with plans for expansion, and can be used offline without the need to dial USSD codes or rely on an internet connection. There are no extra fees or signup requirements, and users can take full control of their finances by transacting with their existing bank and mobile money accounts on the platform. Stax's goal is to make financial services easily accessible and stress-free for everyone in Africa.

EMS|MC is a company that offers revenue cycle management and technology solutions for the emergency medical services (EMS) industry. They provide custom-tailored solutions for EMS systems to improve their efficiency and cost reduction. EMS|MC also offers supplementary revenue programs to help EMS systems provide better care to their communities despite increased costs and pressures. They work to keep their clients up to date and compliant with Medicare regulations, saving time and money. Through their involvement with legislative proposals, EMS|MC clients are provided up-to-date information on laws that can affect the EMS industry. Overall, EMS|MC aims to improve the quality of customer service provided to EMS communities.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: This startup provides gutter brooms for street sweeper manufacturers with over 80 years of experience in the industry. They also offer a variety of other brooms including strip brooms and tube brooms. The brooms are made of durable wire and they ensure quality sweeping performance. This startup aims to provide a one-stop-shop for any type of broom needed to keep sweepers on the road. They have 7 locations nationwide and over 80 years of manufacturing experience in the rotary broom industry, offering exceptional customer service.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: The startup is selling health supplements that contain Coco Complete, which may help promote healthy energy levels, support healthy blood pressure and cardiovascular health and promote immune system function. The supplements come in containers that can be purchased as a one-time purchase for $29.95, or on a subscription basis. Customers who subscribe can save 10% on each purchase and get free shipping, with the frequency of deliveries customizable based on the customer's preferences. The startup offers four options for the number of containers in each subscription delivery, with prices ranging from $71.91 for three containers to $233.64 for 12 containers. The startup also offers a newsletter signup for exclusive offers.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: BDI provides solutions for airport projects involving jet blast and ground run-up noise issues. They offer a diverse range of services such as blast deflectors, jet blast fences/barriers, and acoustic barriers, among others. They have years of experience in delivering these services globally in tough environments. They provide technical support from the early planning phases of a project from site evaluation to guide specifications. Their ISO 9001:2015 quality management system is third-party accredited and audited. They provide turnkey jet blast deflector and ground run-up enclosure projects that add real value to their clients and customers.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: . Croix Hospice provides hospice care services for patients and families who need end-of-life care at home or anywhere they reside. The hospice teams across the Midwest offer care with dignity and respect, focusing on comfort and quality of life. They provide support, education, and resources to the patients and their families right from the start. The hospice care providers at St. Croix Hospice listen to the patients and families to deliver end-of-life care according to their individual wishes. The benefits of hospice care are greatest when services are provided early, and the team of compassionate experts is available 24/7 for support and assistance.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: MVP Marketing + Design is a Minneapolis-based Website Design, Branding and Digital Agency that offers services to clients throughout North America and globally. They have worked with several investment banks and private equity companies to create effective websites that increase traffic and click-throughs. MVP Marketing + Design is a goal-oriented company that develops fine strategies to maximize traffic and click-throughs for their customer's websites. They are a WordPress VIP Silver agency partner providing Cloud-hosted, enterprise-level, and/or E-Comm website support. They focus on helping private equity, sub-debt, or M&A firms simplify their website redesign process, thereby saving time and effort.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: The startup is solving the user problem of protecting their homes or businesses from pests and termite damage. They provide a variety of services such as pest control, termite protection, mosquito control, and disinfecting services backed by a guarantee of total customer satisfaction. Their team is highly professional and knowledgeable with environmentally responsible and customized treatments. They also offer free inspections and quick response times to identify and treat any issues before they escalate. Their goal is to provide a safe and healthy environment for their customers' homes or businesses without any costly repairs or harm to the environment.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: Exhibea is a Shopify Plus agency that designs and develops eCommerce websites for luxury, fashion, and lifestyle brands. They have worked with trusted brands and have created award-winning experiences for some of Shopify Plus' biggest merchants. By providing Shopify Plus services, Shopify website design, and Shopify theme design and development services, they help brands increase their conversion rates and strengthen brand loyalty. Their clients have witnessed a 30% increase in conversion rate, and they are currently booking projects for Q2 2023. They offer free quotes and aim to create a perfect balance of a beautiful experience and strong engagement for eCommerce websites.

startup_solution_in_which_venture_capita: Camily is a video testimonial software that provides users with everything they need to collect and edit video responses from customers, colleagues, and community members. The platform enables users to create fully-branded video capturing pages and share the link to easily collect video content from anyone, anywhere, on any device. The tool also allows users to clip and ship video content instantly and generate video reviews to drive conversions and save thousands on video agency costs. Camily helps users crowdsource, edit, and distribute videos effortlessly, without hiring a video agency or learning any complex tools. Camily's goal is to help users boost website conversions by 80% by making their websites more human with video testimonials.
